name: mcp-figma-desktop
description: MCP Figma to Code - Desktop Application
author: MCP Figma Team

scripts.build: npm run bundle && cd .. && ELECTRON=true npm run build && cd electron-app && npm_config_python=/usr/bin/python3 npx electron-builder
scripts.build:all: npm run bundle && cd .. && ELECTRON=true npm run build && cd electron-app && npm_config_python=/usr/bin/python3 npx electron-builder -mwl
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:mac:arm64 && npm run build:mac:x64 && npm run clean:dmg
scripts.build:mac:arm64: npm run bundle && cd .. && ELECTRON=true npm run build && cd electron-app && npm_config_python=/usr/bin/python3 npx electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.build:mac:x64: npm run clean:dmg && npm_config_python=/usr/bin/python3 npx electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.build:win: npm run bundle && cd .. && ELECTRON=true npm run build && cd electron-app && npm_config_python=/usr/bin/python3 npx electron-builder --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run bundle && cd .. && ELECTRON=true npm run build && cd electron-app && npm_config_python=/usr/bin/python3 npx electron-builder --linux
